body: At 8th level, a knight of the sepulcher gains immunity to poison. He also gains darkvision 60 feet if he does not already possess it. This ability replaces the aura of despair ability.
name: Fortitude of the Crypt
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Paladin/Paladin Archetypes/Knight of the Sepulcher/Fortitude of the Crypt
